headline: Wells Fargo (NYSE:WFC) Announces 12.5% Dividend Increase Pending Board Approval
summary: Wells Fargo (NYSE:WFC) recently announced a planned increase in its Q3 2025 common stock dividend by 12.5%, from $0.40 to $0.45 per share. Over the last quarter, Wells Fargo’s stock price moved up 13%, aligning with broader market trends. Contributing factors likely include the planned dividend increase and a share repurchase program worth up to $40 billion, which demonstrates the company's focus on returning value to shareholders. Additionally, Q1 earnings reports showed a rise in net...

headline: Treasuries Extend Declines as UK Selloff Weighs on Long End

headline: New Wells Fargo Study Shows Parents Give Their Kids an Average Weekly Allowance of $37
summary: SAN FRANCISCO, July 02, 2025--Wells Fargo today released a new study illustrating how much allowance parents are providing their children and the difficulties parents have in teaching their children about money.

headline: Biggest US Banks Boost Payouts After Lighter Fed Stress Test

headline: Wall Street Breakfast Podcast: Banks Pass, Investors Cash In
summary: Wells Fargo plans to raise dividend by 12.5% after stress test results. Paramount to pay $16M to settle lawsuit over Harris interview. Thoma Bravo reportedly in talks to acquire Verint.
